title: Development of buildings of health resort, educational and medical activities, with G + 1 or Stilt +
clause_text: Development of buildings of health resort, educational and medical activities, with G + 1 or Stilt + 2 structure, subject to plantation of indigenous trees at the rate of 5 trees per
